turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi! Are you interested in making a donation to Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hi, Yes I am

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's great to hear! Donations make a huge difference in the lives of these kids. Your help will give them access to food, healthcare, education, and safety, among other things.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I agree. Helping children and pets is one of the donations I enjoy making and helping at the same time.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Do you have an amount in mind that you'd like to donate?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I was thinking to donate around 10 cents for save the children. I hope that is adequate and helps them for food and shelter.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Any amount we can collect for them is welcome. Would it convince you to donate more if I can assure you that the donation is absolutely secure and will be completely given to a trustworthy, verified fund within Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: ok how about 20 cents. I do want to help in anyway that I can.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you so much. It's really appreciated. The amount of suffering that children around the world face is terrible. For example, in the first two months of 2018, a thousand children in Syria were injured in the violence there. Anything you can add to the donation will go directly to helping them.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: yeah I heard a little bit about on how children are suffering. I want to give a donation to help them. I am glad I can help in anyway that I can.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It will make a big difference to Save the Children. The organization has done wonders for kids, saving them from everything from violence to starvation. We as people have a moral responsibility to help them, and when we have extra, there's no better place to put it than in the hands of a trustworthy charity that will use it to save kids.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I believe it is good to be ethical. And to help children and animals as much as we can. Most of all save the children is a trustworthy organization which I trust to put my donations in with.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: To confirm, you said you were willing to donate 20 cents, correct?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes that is correct

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Is there anything you'd like to ask, or any way I can convince you to send a little more to Save the Children in the interests of the kids they work to help?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I feel that 20 cents is adequate for the donation. I want to help in any way that I can. Also I want to verify that this organization is most trusting.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Alright, 20 cents out of the whole task payment amount. Thank you again for the donation. It will be sent to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: thank you. I wanted to help and want to help with a donation

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It's much appreciated.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: what hobbies do you like? and where are you from?
